targets.expr: group by (matrixone_cloud_main_cluster) (up{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixone_cloud_component="cn"}) * 1 unless group by (matrixone_cloud_main_cluster) (server_storage_usage{matrixone_cloud_main_cluster=~"$cluster", matrixone_cloud_component="cn"}) > 0

targets.rawSql: select * from system_metrics.server_storage_usage where $__timeFilter(collecttime) and ($instance_id="ALL" OR account = replace($instance_id, '-', '_')) order by collecttime desc limit $limit;

select collecttime, count(*) account_cnt from system_metrics.server_storage_usage where collecttime between date_sub($__timeTo(), interval 1 minute) and $__timeTo() and ($instance_id="ALL" OR account = replace($instance_id, '-', '_')) group by collecttime order by collecttime desc limit $limit;
select * from system_metrics.server_storage_usage where $__timeFilter(collecttime) and ($instance_id="ALL" OR account = replace($instance_id, '-', '_')) order by collecttime desc limit $limit;

select task_id taskID, task_metadata_id taskMetadataID, task_runner node_uuid, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_at/1e3) as create_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(end_at/1e3) as end_time, IF(task_status=0, 'NOT Start', IF(task_status=1, "Running", IF(task_status=2, "Failed", "Unknown"))) taskStatus, * from mo_task.sys_async_task
where task_metadata_id like 'Storage%' order by create_at desc limit 1;

select * from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and user in (select user from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and `database` = 'mo_task' order by request_at desc limit 1) order by request_at desc limit $limit;

select * from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and user in (select user from system.statement_info where $__timeFilter(request_at) and `database` = 'mo_task' order by request_at desc limit 1) and status = 'Failed' order by request_at desc limit 10;
